name: Flowerain
description:
The game was made for Weekly Game Jam Week 59. Theme: Pacifist!

How to Play: Water flowers and remove wild plants! Pay attention to your score! 

Controls: 

  • Q: water flowers (use this on plants and you get minus points)
  • W: remove wild plants (use this on flowers and you get minus points)
  • Arrows: Look around
